reviews.review:
Half-life 2 is a masterpiece of its time. It introduced realistic mouth movements and had the best graphics of its time. Even to this day, Half-life 2 still looks absolutely amazing, even without graphical mods.

The story of the game follows your typical half-life story, after stopping the Nihilanth, a new villain called the combine took over earth. Now G-man decides to throw the mute scientist with a rocking goatee back to earth to destroy the combine.

Half-life 2 decided to give characters more personality than what was seen in the original game. You don't see clones of the same security guard, or scientist clones. Instead, the generic characters have been given unique appearances. This helps with the story building and immersion for the player.

The gameplay feels absolutely amazing. The source engine makes the physics feel realistic and natural. Combat always feels satisfying, especially in later chapters. You always have to plan ahead, using your strongest weapons only when you're struggling with an opponent. Puzzles don't overstay their welcome, they introduce an idea, you solve it, then the idea appears again in a harder variant later in the game.

To conclude, Half-life 2 is an absolute masterpiece to this day. If you're looking for a solid action-shooter, then Half-life 2 is a wonderful option.
Nice game, really like it. This one is my favourite
